alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 4:38PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect central Erie County Until 600 PM EST.... At 434 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Lake City and Girard to near Wattsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Quick snow accumulations on roadways causing slick travel... Locations impacted include... Interstate 90, Erie, North East, Girard, Waterford, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Platea, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
